summary: In October, the lender published a cryptic letter saying it has experienced “irregularities” in the handling of “specific” corporate funds by a “perpetrator of fraudulent activity.”
title: Crypto Lender Cred Files for Bankruptcy After Losing Funds in Fraud
content: Crypto lender Cred Inc. filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in Delaware on Saturday.
UPDATE (Nov. 8, 20:11 UTC): Adds assets/liabilities, new board member and hiring of restructuring firm.
